summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, west side, from Lander Street to Forest Street, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10410 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
